text: Herbert Baumann (31 July 1925 – 21 January 2020) was a German composer and conductor. He was born in Berlin in 1925 studied at the Internationales Musikinstitut Berlin. He died in Munich in January 2020 at the age of 94.Sikorski.de: Der Komponist Herbert Baumann starb 94-jährig in München (German) == References == == Other websites == * Profile at komponisten.net (in German) * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century German composers Category:German conductors Category:Musicians from Berlin Category:Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany
title: Herbert Baumann
